page.title: 16A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: My day starts at 8.00 a.m. when I get up. At 8.l5 a.m. I have a breakfast of eggs and bacon and at 8.20 I walk the dog. At 8.25 I leave for school, but first I go to the shops. At 8.30 I get to school and play Square for twenty minutes. At 8.55 we come in for registration and at 9.00 we have a year meeting. At 9.l5 we have cooking or health education and at l0.30 we have a break for l5 minutes and I play marbles. Break ends at l0.45. Then we have Art or C.D.T. At l2.00 I go home for dinner. At l2.10 I get home and watch television. At l2.45 I go back to school and play Square. At l2.55 we have registration again. At l.00 we have Humanities or French and at 2.00 we have Games(padder tennis). At 3.00 lessons end and at 3.10 I get home from school.
